meanings.definition: Carefully selected or chosen by hand.
meanings.sent1: The handpicked flowers in the bouquet were so beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She always wears handpicked jewelry that matches her outfits perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The handpicked strawberries were so sweet, they seemed to sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The handpicked team of experts ensured the project's success.
meanings.sent5: The handpicked ingredients made the dish taste like a gourmet meal.

meanings.definition: Selected with great care or attention to detail.
meanings.sent1: The handpicked gifts were wrapped with colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent2: He presented her with a handpicked selection of books for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The handpicked decorations transformed the room into a magical wonderland.
meanings.sent4: The handpicked words in the speech resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The handpicked artwork on the walls added a touch of elegance to the room.
